lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania Supreme Court justice facing possible removal from the bench over his role in trading salacious and objectionable emails wants a state judicial ethics court to consider a deal that could resolve his case.

headline.main: Justice in Ethics Case Over Salacious Emails Wants Hearing
headline.print_headline: Justice in Ethics Case Over Salacious Emails Wants Hearing

snippet: A Pennsylvania Supreme Court justice facing possible removal from the bench over his role in trading salacious and objectionable emails wants a state judicial ethics court to consider a deal that could resolve his case.
